destination.shortDescription: Rome, the Eternal City, is filled with ancient history, vibrant culture, and culinary delights. It is a treasure trove of art, architecture, and historical sites.
destination.shortHistory: Founded in 753 BC, Rome was the heart of the Roman Empire, which ruled much of Europe. It has evolved through the Renaissance to become a symbol of power and culture.

program.location: Piazza del Colosseo, 1, 00184 Roma RM, Italy
program.shortDescriptionOfProgram: Visit this iconic symbol of ancient Rome, where gladiators once fought. Learn about its history and significance.

program.location: Via della Salara Vecchia, 5/6, 00186 Roma RM, Italy
program.shortDescriptionOfProgram: Walk through the ruins of what was once the political heart of Rome. Imagine the grandeur of ancient temples and basilicas.

program.location: Piazza di Trevi, 00187 Roma RM, Italy
program.shortDescriptionOfProgram: Enjoy the breathtaking beauty of the Baroque fountain, and don't forget to toss a coin for good luck!

program.location: Piazza della Rotonda, 00186 Roma RM, Italy
program.shortDescriptionOfProgram: Marvel at this architectural wonder, boasting the world's largest unreinforced concrete dome.
Experience authentic Roman cuisine in the charming streets of Trastevere, a lively neighborhood known for its nightlife.
Explore the vast collections of the Vatican Museums, ending with a viewing of Michelangelo's masterpiece in the Sistine Chapel.

program.location: Piazza San Pietro, 00120 Città del Vaticano, Vatican City
program.shortDescriptionOfProgram: Visit one of the world's largest and most beautiful churches, with stunning architecture and art.
Enjoy a leisurely lunch near the Vatican, sampling local Italian dishes.
Tour the historic castle, once a mausoleum and fortress, offering panoramic views of Rome.
Indulge in some of Rome's finest gelato while enjoying the vibrant atmosphere of this iconic square.

program.location: Piazzale Napoleone I, 00197 Roma RM, Italy
program.shortDescriptionOfProgram: Start your day with a leisurely stroll through these stunning gardens, offering art, nature, and relaxation.

program.location: Piazzale Scipione Borghese, 5, 00197 Roma RM, Italy
program.shortDescriptionOfProgram: Admire the works of Caravaggio, Raphael, and Bernini in this exquisite art gallery housed in a historic villa.

program.location: Piazza di Spagna, 00187 Roma RM, Italy
program.shortDescriptionOfProgram: Visit the famous staircase known for its beauty and historical significance, connecting Piazza di Spagna with the church above.

program.location: Via del Corso, Roma RM, Italy
program.shortDescriptionOfProgram: Take some time to shop on one of Rome's most famous streets, offering both high fashion and local goods.

program.location: Piazza Campo de' Fiori, 00186 Roma RM, Italy
program.shortDescriptionOfProgram: Enjoy a final dinner together at Campo de' Fiori, celebrating the unforgettable experiences shared in Rome.
